timeline.title: Master of Computer Applications
timeline.subtitle: Veer Narmad South Gujarat University, Surat

timeline.title: Bachelor of Computer Application
timeline.subtitle: Veer Narmad South Gujarat University, Surat

timeline.title: Front-End Web UI Frameworks and Tools: Bootstrap 4
timeline.subtitle: The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology and offered through Coursera
timeline.description: This course will give an overview of client-side web UI frameworks, in particular Bootstrap 4. I will learn about grids and responsive design, Bootstrap CSS and JavaScript components. I will learn about CSS preprocessors, Less and Sass.In this course should have prior good working knowledge of HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

timeline.title: Front-End Web Development with React
timeline.subtitle: The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology and offered through Coursera
timeline.description: Develop interactive user interfaces (UIs) and web applications using React, JSX, and ES6.Build dynamic websites and front-end applications quickly and easily with reusable React components.Communicate and exchange data with external services using GET, POST, UPDATE, and DELETE requests.Employ and work with various React concepts and features including props, states, hooks, forms, and Redux.

timeline.title: React Native
timeline.subtitle: Authorized by Meta and offered through Coursera
timeline.description: React Native is an open-source framework for building cross-platform applications (apps) using React and the platform’s native capabilities. In this course, I will move from the basics of React to a more advanced implementation using React Native. I’ll review a wide range of different React components and ways of styling them. And I’ll get to practice using different mobile methods of interactivity with React Native.

timeline.title: Destination Imagination
timeline.subtitle: Participant
timeline.description: Destination Imagination (DI) is a global educational nonprofit dedicated to inspiring the next generation of innovators, leaders and creative problem solvers.

timeline.title: Caretakers of the Environment
timeline.subtitle: Volunteer
timeline.description: The CEI is an independent organization established in 1986, embracing secondary school students, teachers and mentors, whose interests are focused specifically on the issues of environmental protection, promoting education, shaping awarness and training within sustainable development.

timeline.title: Project Implementation
timeline.subtitle: PRJ666 (C)
timeline.description: The students are required to carry out full time software development project in a company.The students must prepare documentation of the project completed as per the guidelines given by the institute.

timeline.title: Seminar Implementation
timeline.subtitle: PRJ666 (C)
timeline.description: The students are required to prepare a seminar on a relevant topic concerning the subject of interest of the student; as well as latest technology.

timeline.title: Machine Learning (ML)
timeline.subtitle: DBS301 (B)
timeline.description: This course is an introduction for students to ML. The course also gives students an idea about various methods and algorithms of Machine Learning and application development of ML.

timeline.title: Design Patterns
timeline.subtitle: INT322 (A)
timeline.description: The purpose of the course is to make student understand how Patterns can be in various object oriented programming languages to solve real world problems.

timeline.title: Advanced Web Technologies
timeline.subtitle: OOP345 (A+)
timeline.description: ASP.NET is a technology used for web application development. It's used to create web applications, web services, and dynamic content-centric websites. ASP.NET is based on CSS, HTML5, and JavaScript.

timeline.title: Full Stack Technology
timeline.subtitle: SYS366 (B+)
timeline.description: The purpose of the course is to make the students capable of developing full stack web applications.

timeline.title: Open Source Web Based Programming
timeline.subtitle: SYS366 (B+)
timeline.description: This course helps students to understand fundamentals of Open Source web based Programming. The course also imparts students learning about Open source web based scripting language PHP and Mysql database. It also includes MVC or Three tier architecture of web based programming.

timeline.title: iOS Development using Swift
timeline.subtitle: OOP244 (A)
timeline.description: This course will help the students to understand the fundamental as well as advanced concepts of iOS Programming. The course also provides them the skills necessary to develop an iOS Application from scratch to deploying it on the App Store.

timeline.title: Python Programming Language
timeline.subtitle: OOP244 (A)
timeline.description: The Python language is used popularly among the people working in the area of Machine Learning (ML), Data Analytics, Artificial Intelligence, Web Application,and even the people working on Desktop Applications.

timeline.title: Artificial Intelligence
timeline.subtitle: DBS201 (A)
timeline.description: The purpose of the course is to make the student capable of implementing the concepts, methods, and tools of Artificial Intelligence.

timeline.title: Front-end Technologies
timeline.subtitle: INT222 (A)
timeline.description: To understand the concepts of HTML, CSS, Front-end Scripting technologies.

timeline.title: Programming in .NET
timeline.subtitle: OOP244 (A)
timeline.description: This course is an introduction to students to understand fundamentals of .NET technology. The course also gives students an idea about VB.NET and ASP.NET Programming.

timeline.title: Data Structures and Design and Analysis of Algorithms
timeline.subtitle: ULI101 (A)
timeline.description: This course introduces the various data structures and algorithms involving these data structures and their logical implementation.

timeline.title: Relational Database Management System
timeline.subtitle: IOS110 (A+)
timeline.description: Give fundamental knowledge of Database Fundamentals like Keys & Normalisation, Oracle Database Server Architecture and Working knowledge of SQL & PL/SQL in Oracle

timeline.title: Object Oriented Programming Methodology
timeline.subtitle: IPC144 (A+)
timeline.description: This course introduces the concepts of object-oriented programming and skills necessary for developing programs in C++.

timeline.title: Cloud Computing
timeline.subtitle: ULI101 (A)
timeline.description: The purpose of the course is to make student capable of implementing the concepts, methods and tools of Cloud Computing

timeline.title: Computer Network
timeline.subtitle: ULI101 (A)
timeline.description: This course aims towards learning fundamentals of computer network. The course teaches about the various network technologies and popular network protocols
